places.name: Rock Garden
places.description: Rock Garden is a unique sculpture garden made from recycled materials, featuring a maze of rock and metal art installations.
places.highlight: Explore the creative artwork of Nek Chand, the garden's creator.

places.name: Rose Garden
places.description: Rose Garden, also known as Zakir Hussain Rose Garden, is a lush garden with over 50,000 rose bushes, making it one of Asia's largest rose gardens.
places.highlight: Visit during the annual Rose Festival for cultural performances.

places.name: Sukhna Lake
places.description: Sukhna Lake is a man-made reservoir known for boating, picnics, and beautiful sunset views against the backdrop of the Shivalik Hills.
places.highlight: Enjoy a boat ride and stroll along the lake promenade.

places.name: Capitol Complex
places.description: The Capitol Complex is a UNESCO World Heritage Site designed by Le Corbusier, featuring government buildings with unique architecture.
places.highlight: Explore the architectural marvels of the High Court and Secretariat.

places.name: Chandigarh Botanical Garden and Nature Park
places.description: The Botanical Garden and Nature Park is a green oasis with diverse plant species, walking trails, and a butterfly park.
places.highlight: Discover the beauty of native and exotic plants.

places.name: Leisure Valley
places.description: Leisure Valley is a series of interconnected gardens and parks, offering a peaceful escape from the city's hustle and bustle.
places.highlight: Take a leisurely stroll through the lush greenery.

places.name: Elante Mall
places.description: Elante Mall is the largest shopping mall in Chandigarh, featuring a wide range of stores, restaurants, and entertainment options.
places.highlight: Shop for fashion, dine, and catch a movie at the mall.

places.name: Government Museum and Art Gallery
places.description: The Government Museum and Art Gallery houses a rich collection of art, sculptures, and historical artifacts.
places.highlight: Explore the cultural heritage of Chandigarh.

places.name: Terraced Garden
places.description: Terraced Garden is known for its blooming flowers, vibrant musical fountain, and serene ambiance.
places.highlight: Attend the musical fountain show in the evening.

places.name: Gurudwara Nada Sahib
places.description: Gurudwara Nada Sahib is a Sikh shrine with historical significance and beautiful architecture.
places.highlight: Experience the spiritual atmosphere of the gurudwara.

places.name: Chhatbir Zoo
places.description: Chhatbir Zoo is a popular wildlife park known for its diverse animal species, including lions, tigers, and elephants.
places.highlight: Get up close with exotic animals in their natural habitats.

places.name: Cactus Garden
places.description: The Cactus Garden is a unique botanical garden with a vast collection of cacti and succulent plants from around the world.
places.highlight: Explore the fascinating world of desert plants.

places.name: Terrace Garden
places.description: Terrace Garden is a beautifully landscaped garden with colorful flowerbeds and scenic views of the city skyline.
places.highlight: Enjoy a peaceful evening amidst nature's beauty.

places.name: FunCity Water Park
places.description: FunCity Water Park is a popular water park with thrilling water rides, wave pools, and family-friendly attractions.
places.highlight: Have a splash-tastic day with friends and family.

places.name: Chandigarh Golf Club
places.description: Chandigarh Golf Club is a prestigious golf course known for its lush green fairways and challenging holes.
places.highlight: Tee off at one of the finest golf courses in the region.

places.name: Le Corbusier Center
places.description: Le Corbusier Center is a museum dedicated to the works and life of the renowned architect Le Corbusier.
places.highlight: Explore architectural exhibits and learn about Chandigarh's design.

places.name: Butterfly Park
places.description: Butterfly Park is a delightful park with colorful butterfly species, making it a great spot for nature enthusiasts.
places.highlight: Observe the mesmerizing world of butterflies.

places.name: International Dolls Museum
places.description: The International Dolls Museum features a vast collection of dolls from different countries, showcasing cultural diversity.
places.highlight: Discover unique dolls and traditions from around the world.
